response.answer_text: Well I don’t know about the world but he is trying to make our country better and he has a good idea which in theory would work which is run our country as a business so we can prosper but when you have other parties trying to block or stall the possible improvements it’s hard plus you have mainstream media also not helping by only reporting one side of the story and not both. I don’t think Donald Trump is making the world a better place. I believe he is misguided in what he is attempting to do and clumsy to incompetent in how he is going about it. His supporters have legitimate concerns and complaints but they’ve chosen a wrecking ball approach to solving the problem - one that is likely to result in great harm. in a way there is one positive aspect of Trump - he has made the community more aware of the concerns and complaints of his supporters. One can hope that a future president who is more capable of dealing with such matters will address these concerns in a less destructive and more effective manner.
